Such a beautiful bag! It’s right up my alley. But unfortunately, way too small for me. (Included my hand in the picture for size comparison. I have small hands). I was hesitant to buy it because of the mixed reviews; some say it’s not too big, not too small but perfect, and others say it’s too small. I decided to go for it anyway and bought it, but after receiving it, I have to agree that it’s too small which I’m bummed about  :( I think that whether this bag is good or not is dependent on the things you carry on you and their size. If you don’t carry a lot or if you do and they’re small things, this bag will work for you! But if you’re like me and you carry bigger things daily, this will also be too small for you. It does not fit long wallets. So I will sadly be returning.

类型: Color: Skull Shoulder Bag Wrist Bag
评论详情: I loved this bag! I only got to use it probably 20 times since I bought it 3 months ago. Such a shame :(

Out of all the purses I've owned over the years this is by far my favorite of all of them. It came with two straps you can swap out. One long just plain black matching the purse material and one short chain with the purse material intertwined. I prefer the long one, and it is long enough that I can wear it slung over my shoulder and head on my oh so large fluffy body. I can't always do this with purse straps.  It has quite a few pockets which I like, various sizes so there's a space for what I need to carry on me. It's not a large purse, but it's not so small to be useless either. I like the size personally. I've been using it daily for the last few months and it's still holding up sturdy.  On a side note, at least on my purse the studs seem to be real metal. I went through a metal detector wearing it. They had me take it off, they used the wand on me and nothing so they looked inside the purse, nothing that would set it off. Just as a final check they took the wand to my purse sitting on the table with nothing around it and off it went. The guy said that's the first time the purse itself set off their metal detectors and had a good laugh.
